description: Returns a BatchPrediction that includes detailed metadata, status, and data file information for a Batch Prediction request.

parameters.name: BatchPredictionId
parameters.description: An ID assigned to the BatchPrediction at creation.

nested_items.name: BatchPredictionId
nested_items.description: An ID assigned to the BatchPrediction at creation. This value should be identical to the value of the BatchPredictionID in the request.

nested_items.name: MLModelId
nested_items.description: The ID of the MLModel that generated predictions for the BatchPrediction request.

nested_items.name: BatchPredictionDataSourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the DataSource that was used to create the BatchPrediction.

nested_items.name: InputDataLocationS3
nested_items.description: The location of the data file or directory in Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3).

nested_items.name: CreatedByIamUser
nested_items.description: The AWS user account that invoked the BatchPrediction. The account type can be either an AWS root account or an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) user account.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the BatchPrediction was created. The time is expressed in epoch time.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time of the most recent edit to BatchPrediction. The time is expressed in epoch time.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A user-supplied name or description of the BatchPrediction.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the BatchPrediction, which can be one of the following values:
PENDING - Amazon Machine Learning (Amazon ML) submitted a request to generate batch predictions.
INPROGRESS - The batch predictions are in progress.
FAILED - The request to perform a batch prediction did not run to completion. It is not usable.
COMPLETED - The batch prediction process completed successfully.
DELETED - The BatchPrediction is marked as deleted. It is not usable.

nested_items.name: OutputUri
nested_items.description: The location of an Amazon S3 bucket or directory to receive the operation results.

nested_items.name: LogUri
nested_items.description: A link to the file that contains logs of the CreateBatchPrediction operation.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A description of the most recent details about processing the batch prediction request.

nested_items.name: ComputeTime
nested_items.description: The approximate CPU time in milliseconds that Amazon Machine Learning spent processing the BatchPrediction, normalized and scaled on computation resources. ComputeTime is only available if the BatchPrediction is in the COMPLETED state.

nested_items.name: FinishedAt
nested_items.description: The epoch time when Amazon Machine Learning marked the BatchPrediction as COMPLETED or FAILED. FinishedAt is only available when the BatchPrediction is in the COMPLETED or FAILED state.

nested_items.name: StartedAt
nested_items.description: The epoch time when Amazon Machine Learning marked the BatchPrediction as INPROGRESS. StartedAt isn't available if the BatchPrediction is in the PENDING state.

nested_items.name: TotalRecordCount
nested_items.description: The number of total records that Amazon Machine Learning saw while processing the BatchPrediction.

nested_items.name: InvalidRecordCount
nested_items.description: The number of invalid records that Amazon Machine Learning saw while processing the BatchPrediction.
